00100 #undef  VERSION

00102 // This is only of interest for developers, so it is included only if
00103 // --with-nana flag is given to configure
00104 #ifdef HAVE_LIBNANA
00105 #   include "nana.h"
00106 #   include "DL.h"
00107 #else
00108 #   define I(e)    /* empty */
00109 #   define DL(e)   /* empty */
00110 #   define VDL(e)  /* empty */
00111 #endif

00113 #ifdef  CCXX_NAMESPACES
00114 namespace ost {
00115 #endif
00116 
00117 #ifdef WIN32
00118 
00119 #ifndef timeradd
00120 #define timeradd(a, b, result)                                 \
00121 {                                                              \
00122   (result)->tv_sec = (a)->tv_sec + (b)->tv_sec;                \
00123   (result)->tv_usec = (a)->tv_usec + (b)->tv_usec;             \
00124   if ( (result)->tv_usec >= 1000000 ) {                        \
00125           (result)->tv_sec++; (result)->tv_usec -= 1000000ul;  \
00126   }                                                            \
00127 }
00128 #endif
00129 
00130 #ifndef timersub
00131 #define timersub(a, b, result)                                 \
00132 {                                                              \
00133   (result)->tv_sec = (a)->tv_sec - (b)->tv_sec;                \
00134   (result)->tv_usec = (a)->tv_usec - (b)->tv_usec;             \
00135   if ( (result)->tv_usec < 0 ) {                               \
00136           (result)->tv_sec--; (result)->tv_usec += 1000000ul;  \
00137   }                                                            \
00138 }
00139 #endif
00140 
00141 #endif // WIN32
00142 
00143 // Number of seconds ellapsed from 1900 to 1970
00144 const uint32 NTP_EPOCH_OFFSET = static_cast<uint32>(2208992400ul);
00145 
00146 uint32 random32();
00147 uint16 random16();
00148 
00149 #ifdef  CCXX_NAMESPACES
00150 }
00151 #endif
00152 
00153 #endif // ifndef CCXX_RTP_PRIVATE_H_
